original_text: “‘Because you harbored an ancient hostility and delivered the Israelites over to the sword at the time of their calamity, the time their punishment reached its climax,
korean_text: 네가 옛날부터 한을 품고 이스라엘 족속의 환난 때 곧 죄악의 마지막 때에 칼의 위력에 그들을 넘겼도다

sentences.original_text: Because you harbored an ancient hostility
and delivered the Israelites over to the sword
at the time of their calamity
the time their punishment reached its climax
